captions.text: Hello and welcome to a new video
Today we will review the extremely rare and adidas Primeknit from a limited edition of 500.
You’ve got a chance to win this boot.
To find out how stick around until the end of the video. Enjoy the video!
To begin with I had some problems with the adidas Primeknit
The boots left pressure marks and blisters at the front of the foot as it is rather small.
Following two to three training sessions it got better and the blisters went away as well
The feel for the ball is very good.
This is down to the very soft fabric which feels softer than leather
I did miss the zones which boots such as the Predator have got
This may prevented a higher rating
but doesn’t necessarily have to be a disadvantage
The quality of the adidas Primeknit is very high
This is of course suggested by the price, which demands a high-quality boot
Adidas have produced a high-quality boot so again it receives a maximum score
Let’s get to the verdict for the adidas Primeknit
Overall I had high expectations which was also down to the high price
which promises something exclusive
Most aspects were fulfilled
However, all in all I believe
that this boot is too expensive
Given the quality one could also purchase the adidas F50 in the leather version
which would also fulfil and even exceed most aspects
Anyone wanting to buy a high-quality and very exclusive boot should, of course, go ahead
After all the Primeknit is a very good boot that does a lot of things right
for everyone else I would recommend the aforementioned F50 in leather or the Tiempo 5
These boots are comparable and are much better value for money
Overall this boots gets 9 out of 10 points from me
You can win the adidas Primeknit (size 44)
In order to have a chance of winning it
please rate the video and let us know in the comments section what you like most about the adidas Primeknit
You have got 4 weeks and the winner will be notified via a YouTube message
Have fun and good luck. See you in the next video!

title: Ultimate adidas Primeknit Test & Free Kick Review by freekickerz
